tool_description: Validates and sanitizes incoming customer messages, checking for malicious content and formatting issues.

message_type.description: Type of message: text, file, image

error_messages: Empty message: Message text cannot be empty or null
Message too long: Message exceeds 5000 character limit
Invalid content detected: Message contains prohibited content
Unsupported message type: Use one of [text, file, image]
usage: Provide message_text and optionally message_type. Returns validated and cleaned message data safe for processing.
